description: Detects rundll32 loading a renamed comsvcs.dll to dump process memory
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Renamed Comsvcs DLL Loaded By Rundll32
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\rundll32.exe" AND winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*IMPHASH\=eed93054cb555f3de70eaa9787f32ebb* OR *IMPHASH\=5e0dbdec1fce52daae251a110b4f309d* OR *IMPHASH\=eadbccbb324829acb5f2bbe87e5549a8* OR *IMPHASH\=407ca0f7b523319d758a40d7c0193699* OR *IMPHASH\=281d618f4e6271e527e6386ea6f748de*)) AND (NOT dll.path:*\\comsvcs.dll))
